COURSE_OUTLINE_PROMPT:
Generate a course outline based on the input files and instructions provided. The course outline should include the following sections:
The number of modules specified, the module name, the module description and each module should have the learning outcomes
Do not have any text, just give me the course outline
Input:
- Instructions: Additional instructions for generating the course outline
{INSTRUCTIONS}
Output:
- Course Outline: The generated course outline with the specified sections and modules
